Optimal Power Flow¶

The power flow is the most important static network calculation operation. This section shows you how to run different power flows (AC, DC, OPF), what known problems and caveats there are and how you can identify problems using the pandapower diagnostic function.

  • Optimisation problem
    • Cost functions
    • Visualization of cost functions
  • Optimization with PYPOWER
    • AC OPF
    • DC OPF
  • Optimization with PowerModels.jl
    • Installation
    • Usage
